Thrash schedule app

  In my work, we make a monthly schedule for taking out the thrash from the office, so it doesn't accumulate.
  Every month, it was requiring a manual effort for organizing this schedule.
  So i made a python web application for generating this schedule automatically, respecting the days when the employee is not in the office (Home office days).
  I'm also using this app for studying frontend development, refactoring it using Jquery, vanilla javascript (with and without classes), React, etc.
